analyses.title: Hard Architecture Mapping: Graphiti
analyses.description: Comprehensive Level 1 analysis revealing five-layer clean architecture (Storage → LLM/Embedding → Domain Logic → Search → Orchestration), bi-temporal data model (occurrence + ingestion time), temporal invalidation mechanism, hybrid retrieval (semantic + BM25 + graph), and pluggable backends (4 drivers, 4 LLM providers, 3 embedders).
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: Establishes technical ground truth: Graphiti is temporal-first framework with explicit bi-temporal tracking enabling point-in-time queries and contradiction resolution without LLM inference

metadata.special_focus: Temporal knowledge graphs, bi-temporal data model, hybrid retrieval

backlog.title: Strategic Shift: From Batch Document Graphs → Real-Time Living Memory
backlog.description: Strategic initiative to adopt 6 interconnected paradigm shifts for AI agent memory: Graph as Living Memory, Temporal Correctness, Constraint Exploitation, Evidence-First Development, Documentation as Reality, Real-Time Incremental. 12-24 month transformation roadmap with $800K investment and 7-10× expected ROI.
backlog.strategic_context: Investigation revealed Graphiti paradigms enable 10-50× improvements in AI agent memory systems. Organizations adopting these paradigms gain insurmountable competitive advantage (sub-second vs. 5-30s queries, real-time vs. stale data, 10× cost reduction). Delaying adoption 12-24 months means competitors establish dominant position.
backlog.author: GitHub Copilot

metadata.target_paradigm: Graph as Living Memory (Six Interconnected Paradigms)
